The candle lantern is a type of members-only light source used in the Firemaking skill. To make a candle lantern, the player must first have an unlit candle, an empty candle lantern, and at least level 4 Firemaking. The player places the white candle in the lantern frame and lights it, using a tinderbox. No experience is received when lighting a candle lantern. They cannot be traded whilst lit.

The empty candle lantern can be filled with a black candle to give a black candle lantern.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 November 2021
(update)

Placing a lit candle into a candle lantern now requires level 4 Firemaking. Previously, players could circumvent the Firemaking requirement by using a lit candle on the candle lantern instead of an unlit candle.

The '''candle lantern''' is a type of members-only light source used in the [[Firemaking]] skill. To make a candle lantern, the player must first have an unlit [[candle]], an [[empty candle lantern]], and at least level 4 Firemaking. The player places the white candle in the lantern frame and lights it, using a tinderbox. No experience is received when lighting a candle lantern. They cannot be traded whilst lit.

The empty candle lantern can be filled with a [[black candle]] to give a black candle lantern.

==Firemaking info==

|version2 = Unlit (black candle)

}}
